detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams, side panels, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Flatlock seams and a high waist with a wide waist panel.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar and button placket with a frilled trim. Gathered yoke at the back and gathered seams at the shoulders. Seam and a detachable tie belt under the bust, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck that has elasticated gathers at the front and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim.

Calf-length dress in a soft linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline at the front and frill-trimmed smocking at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the shoulders and cuffs, a seam under the bust and a flared skirt. Unlined.
